channel.title: Mert Bozkir's Digital Garden on
channel.description: Recent content in Mert Bozkir's Digital Garden on

item.description: Sharing your failure is real confidence Do not fake it till you make it, share your failures and your journey!

item.title: about
item.description: hit here to see my side projects

item.title: Higgs Boson pipelines
item.description: What I want is to build a reproducible pipeline for the ATLAS 2014 Higgs Boson challenge. There are already some codebases for training and prediction.

item.title: Ian's podcast about League MLOps
item.description: They are using some recsys for riot games (e.g collaborative filtering) They uses binary format for making fast compile time.

item.title: League Versioning and Pipelines
item.description: I have 14gigs of data from all regions. It’s public in here I’m trying to parse this big file into smaller region-partitioned parquet data.

item.title: MLOps Resources to learn during ##66DaysOfMLOps challenge
item.description: Designing ML Systems book by Chip Huyen: In this book, you’ll learn how to design a machine learning (ML) system that is reliable, scalable, maintainable, and adaptive to changing environments and business requirements.

item.title: Podcasts
item.description: You can find all podcast-notes here Ian podcast about MLOps in League

item.title: Side Projects
item.description: This page contains my side projects that I want to work on it, but doesn’t have time :/ League MLOps Project: I have 14gigs of data from all regions.
